name: querqy-upload-es-ruleset
description: This task extracts contents of the glob files and uploads that content to elastic as ruleset
author: Estefan Antelo Doval

inputs.name: fileGlob
inputs.label: File(s) Glob Pattern(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use one or multiple glob patterns, by separating them with a comma. e.g.`"**/*-100.ruleset, **/.ruleset/*"`

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The service connection with the credentials for the server authentication. Use the Generic service connection type for the service connection.
